text: Percy Cummings (born 5 September 1946) is a former Australian rules football player who played five games for Hawthorn Football Club. Cummings is the grandson of Joe Johnson, the first recognised Indigenous Australian to play in the VFL/AFL. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Hawthorn Football Club players Category:Indigenous Australian players of Australian rules football Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Percy Cummings
